doctor.name: Dr. Golam Rabbani
doctor.info: Dr. Golam Rabbani is a Rheumatology Specialist in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Rheumatology), MRCP (UK). He is working as a Rheumatology Specialist doctor in Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. Golam Rabbani at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rangpur is 3pm to 9pm (Everyday).
